short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your codes and get them quickly from google search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The SaveCode.net extension will helps you: 
- Save your codes from any website.
- Quickly get useful codes in google search results page.
- Create or join a team and share codes to all members.
